title: Backend Developer
description: Contributed to backend services and improved performance by 30%. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build APIs.

title: Software Engineer
description: Worked on a microservices architecture, integrating several REST APIs. Participated in daily standups and sprint reviews.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Built responsive web interfaces with React. Optimized user experience and implemented accessibility improvements.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Managed CI/CD pipelines and automated deployments. Improved system uptime and monitored infrastructure health.

title: QA Analyst
description: Designed and executed test plans for major releases. Reduced post-release bugs by implementing automated testing suites.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyzed large datasets to support business decisions. Created interactive dashboards and reported key insights.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Worked across frontend and backend, delivering features end-to-end. Maintained legacy systems and transitioned to new tech.

title: IT Support Specialist
description: Provided technical support to end-users. Resolved issues efficiently and contributed to IT documentation.

title: Project Manager
description: Led software projects from planning to delivery. Coordinated teams and maintained communication with stakeholders.

title: UX Designer
description: Researched user behavior and designed wireframes. Delivered user-centric designs and collaborated with developers.
